Pre-Game Insights: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) announced a pre-match show featuring singers Arijit Singh, Shankar Mahadevan, and Sukhwinder Singh at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad on October 14, 2023.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the ICC World Cup 2023 and was highly anticipated due to the rivalry between India and Pakistan.Restaurants and other businesses in Ahmedabad prepared special offerings to attract cricket fans.Ahmedabad police designated the city a 'no-drone zone' during the match.
